item.title: Count unicode characters in JavaScript
item.description: There are several ways to count strings in JS in Unicode Code Point units instead of 16-bit units, but in the end, I wonder which method works in most environments (including legacy browsers like IE11) as of May 2017.

item.title: IME event handling in JavaScript cross-browser (2017)
item.description: In 2017, when CompositionEvent is supported by many major browsers, I thought it would be easy to implement a small input completion function that supports Japanese input in JavaScript, but the details of the implementation differed depending on the browser...
